objects.text:
• Premium unisex eau de toilette for all occasions
• Fresh, clean, and modern fragrance profile
• Elegant design with luxurious gold cap

Vibrant & Invigorating
Fragrance for All
100ml | 3.4 fl. oz

product_details.name: BELLAVITA Fresh Unisex EDT - Vibrant & Invigorating Fragrance for All
product_details.description:
• ✨ Premium unisex eau de toilette suitable for all occasions
• 🌊 Fresh, clean, and modern fragrance profile
• ⚡ Generous 100ml/3.4 fl. oz size for long-lasting use
• 🎁 Elegant turquoise bottle with luxurious gold cap design
• 💫 Perfect for daily wear - gender-neutral appeal
• 🌟 Professional-grade eau de toilette formulation
• ✅ Sophisticated packaging ideal for gifting
• 🔝 Travel-friendly size meets airline regulations
• ⭐ Versatile fragrance suitable for both day and night wear
• 💎 Premium quality at competitive price point

banner_details:
This banner features a split layout with a fresh, modern aesthetic ideal for beauty or fragrance product promotions. The left half of the banner is composed of a teal-to-emerald gradient background with subtle semi-transparent decorative circles and abstract yellow-gold wave elements at the top and bottom, adding dynamic flow. Text elements include bold white title text ("heading"), a vibrant gold subheading ("subheading"), and concise white product features ("description") and a promotional tagline ("tagline"). The price ("price") stands out in bright yellow with a bold font, paired with a yellow call-to-action button ("cta_button") hosting contrasting green call-to-action text ("cta"). The right half showcases a high-resolution product image ("product_image") over a clean, light-grey background. Thin gold vertical separation between sections enhances visual clarity.

**Color Palette:**
- Teal: #1AACA0
- Deep Green: #0B5D57
- Gold: #FFD700
- Orange-Gold: #FFAA00
- White: #FFFFFF
- Light Grey: #F5F5F5
product_color: The product image uses a vibrant aqua cyan (#00B8C4) as the primary color for the bottle, evoking freshness and vitality. The gold metallic cap (#D4AF37) adds a luxurious contrast, enhancing the premium appeal. White text (#FFFFFF) ensures high readability against the vivid background while maintaining a clean and modern style. The aqua shade is rich and evenly distributed, while soft shadows and reflections subtly blend to highlight the bottle’s curves and glossy finish. This harmonious blend of bright aqua, metallic gold, and clean white creates a crisp, refreshing aesthetic—ideal for an advertisement that conveys clarity, freshness, and elegance.
